attributes.action: Make all politicians undergo a series of tests
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
You wouldn’t employ someone without performing a series of tests. 
Don’t be fooled by their persusive and passionate speech. 
The job they undertake is one of extreme importance. 

The government and opposition MPs are not doing a good enough job. Not for £60K.

For £60k I would like to see a minimum of a 10 year track record of delivering products on time and budget.  

Ministers need to be significantly better than backbenchers.

For the posts listed below, there needs to be a minimum of a 20 years track record delivering complex products on time and budget. 


PM                         £190K

Cabinet minister           £139K 

Minister of state          £102K

Under seceratary of state  £92K

The last 5 PMs on average have done less than 10 years before going into politics.


All politicians should be tested on the following. 

Impartiality 

General knowledge

Local and national issues

Ministers  and Opposition front benchers should have also have tough additional tests on


International issues 

Management skills

Problem solving 

The results should be made public. The public can then make an informed decissions.

The future of the country is in their hands. If the last 3 decades is an indication of the future, god help us.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
